member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform.SetAngle
member.summary: Changes the value of the Angle property of a 2D rotation transform. The Angle property specifies the rotation angle.
member.param: The new rotation angle, in degrees. A positive angle creates a clockwise rotation, and a negative angle creates a counterclockwise rotation. For values less than –360 or greater than 360, the values wrap around and are treated as if the mathematical operation mod(360) was applied.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform.SetAngle
member.summary: Animates the value of the Angle property of a 2D rotation transform. The Angle property specifies the rotation angle.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the Angle property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform.SetCenterX
member.summary: Changes the value of the CenterX property of a 2D rotation transform. The CenterX property specifies the x-coordinate of the point about which the rotation is performed.
member.param: The new x-coordinate of the center point.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform.SetCenterX
member.summary: Animates the value of the CenterX property of a 2D rotation transform. The CenterX property specifies the x-coordinate of the point about which the rotation is performed.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the CenterX property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform.SetCenterY
member.summary: Changes the value of the CenterY property of a 2D rotation transform. The CenterY property specifies the y-coordinate of the point about which the rotation is performed.
member.param: The new y-coordinate of the center point.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform.SetCenterY
member.summary: Animates the value of the CenterY property of a 2D rotation transform. The CenterY property specifies the y-coordinate of the point about which the rotation is performed.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the CenterY property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform
member.summary: Represents a 2D transformation that affects the rotation of a visual around the z-axis. The coordinate system is rotated around the specified center point.
